review: I'm coming up on one year of use in April and I gotta say...this thing is AMAZING It's super fast and easy to use. I play games, watch movies (prime/netflix), listen to music (amazon and pandora), and can see all my phone photos/videos on my TV (unlimited photo storage for prime members). Amazon has upgraded the interface  a few times and is consistently adding new Apps( history channel, etc) that make this my go to device for all my electronic entertainment. Every time I show guests what it can do they are amazed and want one too

review: I could not get past the second step of the setup process, even after calling Amazon multiple times today.For whatever reason it will not connect to my modem with an Ethernet cable. My ISP confirms everything is fine on their end. An Amazon rep created a tech ticket for me this morning and said they would get back to me  because it was an issue the developers had to look into. It's a real drag that I went through setting up internet service in my home, solely to use this device and for it not to even come on. I did buy it refurbished,  maybe that is part of the problem...
